response: To protect our personal information from being exploited by others, we need to take certain measures such as keeping our passwords confidential, avoiding clicking on suspicious links, not sharing personal details online, and deleting accounts if they are no longer needed. It is important to be vigilant about the data privacy policies of different social media platforms, apps and other digital tools. We should also be aware of the consequences of our online behavior and avoid posting sensitive information publicly.<|endoftext|>
